Package com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.function

Matcher applying functions to the matched objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Function<T,R>
    Anticipated function from Java 8+/Guava used in Hamcrest context to access an aspect of the matched object for comparison.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplyingMatcher<F,T>
    Matcher which first transforms the matched object and hands over the comparison to the delegate matcher.

Package com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.function Description

Matcher applying functions to the matched objects. This is actually an anticipation of Java 8/Guava and implementation details might change when Hamcrest migrates to Java 8.
Since:
0.1.0
